feature_name: Autopilot persona behavior layer with next-step engine
scope_summary: Upgrade Appointment Autopilot Lite from copy-only personas to behavior-driven personas by shipping persona profiles, right-now action suggestions, sprint/breathe overlays, persona-toned out-the-door messaging, and explicit reminder-scope trust copy.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: The change remains in productivity planning scope with no regulated claims, consent surface expansion, or legal document updates.
evidence: Behavior changes are local UI logic and persisted persona selection
No new billing, account, or policy acceptance workflows were added

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: Persona selection and action state remain local-first in IndexedDB/localStorage with no silent cloud sync.
evidence: Selected persona persists in local storage layer alongside appointments
No API endpoint calls were introduced in the shipped browser bundle

medical_scope_and_claims.rationale: Copy remains operational and behavioral without diagnosis, treatment, or outcome guarantees.
evidence: Out-the-door lines are motivational prompts tied to execution
Trust line explicitly scopes reminders to in-app runtime behavior

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: The right-now card reduces choice overload through persona-controlled action limits and immediate one-tap execution.
evidence: Persona maxChoices actively limits suggested actions
Action engine prioritizes overdue/pending steps plus short regulation prompt

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: Mode behavior now adapts directive intensity, option count, and execution scaffolding based on selected persona profile.
evidence: Calm/Coach/Friend profiles provide higher choice counts and softer labels

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Users gain clearer immediate actions and explicit expectation-setting around reminder limits; downside is low and mainly stylistic mismatch if persona choice is wrong.
evidence: Right-now panel actions execute directly (do step, sprint, maps, breathe)
Visible trust copy prevents false assumptions about background notifications

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: Persona lines stay direct and non-manipulative while making support style differences obvious in behavior and language.
evidence: Out-the-door copy now varies by persona tone
Action labels shift ask-vs-tell style via persona tone

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: Controls remain button-driven, readable, and mobile-responsive with reduced ambiguity around next actions.
evidence: Right-now suggestions are explicit, tappable actions
Timer overlays use large countdown text and clear close controls

security_and_reliability.rationale: No new external dependencies or network integrations were added to runtime behavior, and build pipeline remains deterministic.
evidence: Updated hub/beta assets are static build artifacts only
Mode and persona logic executes entirely client-side

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: No monetization behavior or conversion funnels are introduced in this change.

ship_decision.conditions: Ship and verify persona-specific choice counts and out-the-door copy on live /hub/beta/.
